snippet.title: Nobody: The Turnaround - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Nobody: The Turnaround launches on PC via Steam in fall 2022. Watch the reveal trailer for this upcoming survival simulator, where you take the role of a blue-collar "nobody" that is trying to make ends meet and navigate difficult choices in grimy alleyways and low-rent hostels. 

In Nobody: The Turnaround, utilize the resources at hand, develop job skills for self-improvement, and make challenging decisions that impact the characters you encounter every day. You must make the most of every opportunity in their struggle to make a name for themselves in society and turn their status of nobody into somebody.

#IGN #Gaming
